You cannot go wrong with this awesome camera especially with the price compared to similar models.

Reviews.Title: GREAT VALUE! GREAT PRICE!
Reviews.Author: Eugene F. Lovett "geneie1"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my daughter who is rough on cameras. She put it through its paces and is very happy with its performance. The Fujifilm FinePix S700 is a very affordable 10x optical zoom lens digital camera. The powerful optical zoom and the 1/2.5-inch, 7 mega-pixel CCD imager helps capture perfect images. Multiple media slots are included for more storage options. It has a 2.5-inch LCD display, auto/manual focus, multiple exposure modes, 8 white balance modes and a popup flash. For those times when you can't decide if you need a flash or not, it will take two shots back to back--one with flash and one without--then let you decide which picture you like best. Great value at a great price!

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm finepix S700
Reviews.Author: P. Hill
Reviews.Content: Wow, what a great camera. The camera takes great photos and it is easy to learn. You can't miss!

Reviews.Title: Great Beginner Camera
Reviews.Author: Anna in NJ
Reviews.Content: The Fugi Finepix S700 has exceeded all expectations....A good camera that doesn't have to break the bank....

Reviews.Title: What a Deal....
Reviews.Author: dapperdan
Reviews.Content: What a great little camera this Fuji s700 is. Everything I expected!! Got a great deal here on Amazon compared to other sites and retail stores. Shipping was quick and perfect condition. I would highly reccomend this camera to anyone looking for a great deal..easy to use, near proffesional. I give it a good 5 star rateing.

Reviews.Title: good camera for price
Reviews.Author: Nolley P. Fisher
Reviews.Content: camera very easy to set up and use.first digital camera i have used.zoom is very good.video could be a lot better.overall extremely pleased.

Reviews.Title: Good camera just takes some getting used to
Reviews.Author: Mark R. Campbell
Reviews.Content: I would say this is a great camera. Only a few shots I could not get due to auto focusing issues at first but learned how to get past most of those problems.

Reviews.Title: Terrible results
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: This was my 5th digital camera, second by Fuji.  Trying to be as polite as possible, but sometimes you need to call a spade a spade.  Comparing it against the other cameras I have had, it is the worst camera I have ever pushed the shutter button down on.  For a point and shoot camera it's the worst.  Take a look at the images I posted and form your own opinion.  These were the first images taken with this camera on auto mode.  I bought it today and it's going back tomorrow.  My Fuji E550 is a far better camera than this one.  Perhaps you might look at it or a newer E model.  I also own an Olympus C2100, it's an old 2.1mil megapixel camera with a 10 power zoom with stabilizer and it far outperforms this camera.

Reviews.Title: Compare with other Manufactures first
Reviews.Author: Lynn D. Walther "String Lover"
Reviews.Content: The camera is to small and acward to use. I recommend a good sturdy tripod if your hands are large. Compare this to a canon product before purchasing this digital camera. There is a noticeable difference between the two Manufactures.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice and product!
Reviews.Author: Horacio Bustos
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera to begin on the world's photografers amateur, i bought this camera and the price for the quality is the best choice! Amazing!

Reviews.Title: picture time
Reviews.Author: Kelly Pavelko
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera, it is the best one I have ever owned.  Its awesome.

Reviews.Title: 5 STARS FOR ZOOM PICS, 4 STARS FOR THE TIME IT TAKES TO LEARN
Reviews.Author: m koicuba
Reviews.Content: this camera is the first  camera i bought  after doing extensive research on casio  exz-750 and alot of others , i choose this one  for the clear user submitted  pics ive seen  compared to all the other user submitted  pics on the casio as well as the others . i took 2 pics  of my own and added it to  the user submitted pics , check them out :) this camera has alot to offer , and it was only a little over 200.00 dollars !! i havent used the video yet , but when i do ill be back for another  review :) the only draw back for me  is the learning curve of how to use it.  what modes to use  with what pics ! ive had my moments of wanting to throw it up against the wall for frustration of not figuring out the camera but i found with  applyed patience ive learned how to take good pics with a few of the camera scene selections . everyday im learning more.i seriuosly think i can win some photo contests with this camera, be sure to check out my pics i took  in the user submitted gallery , copyrighted of course ( the gray cat  looking up at the moth on the chain(cat i mean moth has got my tongue !!lol check it out ! .  but if you find that yo utake a picture and its not perfect ,have no fear  photoshop is always near  , to make it better . which i havent had  to use yet. you should buy a camera card for this camera sinse it only holds  a few pictures . that  dont bother me none ,  it just gives me more reason to snap away  at anything my heart dessires .AAA+ i love this cameras zoom pics

Reviews.Title: I didn't like the lack of super CCD
Reviews.Author: Heber Vega Valenzuela
Reviews.Content: First of all, this S700 is not a bad camera. It does a lot for the money but before I bought this one I owned another finepix, the S5000 with Super CCD and the quality of the pictures are not comparable (even that S5000 it has only 3.1 Mega Pixels).Secondly, the body of the camera it doesn't feel "solid" but "plastic". So after a week of having this camera I decided to sell it and buy a Finepix S600Fd, what is a totally different product. My 2 cent advice is that with 100 dollars more (if you have) go for something that feels almost like a DSLR.check this link:Fujifilm Finepix S6000fd 6.3MP Digital Camera with 10.7x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom with Picture Stabilizationthis is a real incredible camera (S6000fd) for the price... one step before a DSLR!

Reviews.Title: Not very good pics
Reviews.Author: D. Woodruff
Reviews.Content: The camera has alot of nice features, but the pictures were not what we were expecting. The quality was subpar from the last camera we had, which was a finepix also. I would not recommend this to anyone. We are still trying to find a finepix that works though.

Reviews.Title: faulty weak components
Reviews.Author: w Myers
Reviews.Content: The flash is made very flimsily. I have had this camera for a few years but use it rarely due to it being very bulky.With the way I cared for it and the little use it had, there is no reason that the flash "pop-up" mechanism should have failed. Without the flash completely opening, you get no flash at all. I have crammed a piece of paper in the camera to hold the flash open all the time. These cameras cost too much money for Fuji to have skimped on moving components.Check the internet. There are quite a few people who have had this issue with this camera.

Reviews.Title: how do you put date stamp on pics?
Reviews.Author: J. Gilsdorf
Reviews.Content: how do you set the camera to put the date stamp on the pictures when you develop them?  The date shows up on the LCD screen, but not on pictures when you develop them.

Reviews.Title: I Like It!
Reviews.Author: Jenny M. Vang "UsoIsLove"
Reviews.Content: When I received my Fujifilm Finepix S700, I was ecstatic. I immediately started taking pictures with it and was amazed at the picture quality. Before actually purchasing it, I did some research to see what others thought of it. I'm satisfied with my choice of decision to buy the S700. The only problems I have with it is closing the battery compartment. It was hard trying to snap the lid shut, but overall, I like it.

Reviews.Title: Another great Fuji Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Hall-lavoie "Stay at Home Mom"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Fuji digital camera. I was very tempted to go the Canon route this time until I found the s700 at a great price. I have only had it one day and am totally pleased. I am pretty much just using it for point and shoot with the kids, but it takes really good pics. I also wanted some zoom after having teh odler model Fuji's I was ready to get in close and this one did the trick fo rthat too. I am very pleased !!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and performance
Reviews.Author: Ignacio Llorente
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm Finepix S700 7.1MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom It is an excellent camera for the purposes that I'm using it,images from singular buildings.

Reviews.Title: I might get a lemon
Reviews.Author: Christine Li "Chris"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product after reading so many good reviews about it. Yet just like many other frustrated reviewers here, I found out the picture quality is poor: very grainy indoor or outdoor shots, no matter what settings I use. Since it received so many good reviews too, the only explanation I can think of is that I might get a lemon. Finally I returned it. Thanks for Amazon's excellent return policy, I was able to get all my money back.

Reviews.Title: Camera for My Daughter
Reviews.Author: Julianne L. Duffield "jdolphin_1"
Reviews.Content: This was the camera that my daughter wanted if her grades were good enough. I had seen it in the stores, but it was much more expensive. This was a better deal than in actual store. It arrived faster than promised and was well pacakaged. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: It's just so so...handle close up job
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: I had 2 Fuji camera already that why I bought this one.my old one FinePix F450 5.2 mega pixel made in Japan was superb handle close up job ( I shoot very detail object under light setting ) compact,made with good material very good weight and A + quality that made me believe in this brand.Then I bought this camera FinePix S700 light weight plastic look cheap made in Indonesia I don't know does it make any difference of where product was made but picture quality totally difference can not compare with my old one(well it is very good price on Amazon anyway)I play around try to get it to work. just a little disappoint for picture quality ( I'm talking about very closed up shot 2-7 inches close ) even in super macro mode.beside use for my work closed up picture,this camera taking picture of my pet and other outdoor, in door was good picture quality.fast shipping that is very good about amazon.Recommend go to store try it yourself for any camera Read review may not help you get what you are really looking for.because people use it for difference job then get difference feedback.

Reviews.Title: good product, good delivery
Reviews.Author: Frank G. Osborn
Reviews.Content: The order was sent in a timely manor and was in good working condition on arrival.I think this camera is awesome, but I'm keeping my old Canon EX Auto. I see the value of getting it serviced and back in use now.

Reviews.Title: on the verge of professional
Reviews.Author: Brooke
Reviews.Content: pretty good. i like it. have taken some seriously awesome shots with it. i couldn't live with out it... that is fosho

Reviews.Title: Dosen't work at all.And customer support says they dont help customers with this camera!
Reviews.Author: Anthony Lomenzo
Reviews.Content: I read the instruction manual for this digital camera.Cant get it to work! I called customer/technical support and was told by there tech help representitive they dont help there customers with camera products! I asked to speak to a supervisor.Left a voice mail message and never got a return phone call.I will never buy this product again! they stink! they told me to just keep reading the instruction manual untill i figure it out!

Reviews.Title: Camera Promotion not as it seems
Reviews.Author: D. Moore "dcjsm1"
Reviews.Content: The camera was great but the promotion to get the 1gb card with it was a complete disaster. There is no free memory card with this camera after about threee days of trying to get it out of amazon I quit trying.

Reviews.Title: throw it at the wall
Reviews.Author: Laughinggrrl
Reviews.Content: Noise, distortion, blurring, and not in any interesting way.  No matter the settings, the light, the environment, the subject, the quality is disgraceful.  I hate this miserable camera.

Reviews.Title: fragile
Reviews.Author: German
Reviews.Content: Es una camara con un buen diseño, pequeña y liviana.la compre para regalo pero cuando la obsequie el sistema mostraba un error en el sistema de los lentes, deben tener cuidado pues aparentemente su sistema es bastante fragil.no incluye funda protectora y por sus dimensiones y sistema de lente fijo no es facil encontrar uno a la medida.

Reviews.Title: I expected much more
Reviews.Author: BBowman "BBowman"
Reviews.Content: I really expected more out of this camera for the price. I am not happy with the quality of the pictures or the automatic focus on the device. I do not recommend this product.

7.1-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 15 x 20-inch prints
2.5-inch LCD screen; 10x optical zoom, 48x Total zoom
Movie mode at 30fps with sound in Motion JPEG (.AVI) format
Picture Stabilization mode; Mode Dial for ease of use
Compatible with SD and xD media cards
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm Finepix S700 7.1MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom
